PHRASE.LANG: Earth Fleet has constructed a new residency wing of the Novus Prime space station for high-ranking Obsidian pilots. Each apartment includes a Zero-Gravity Simulation System for the owner and guests. [#Legal]

La Flotte Terrienne a construit une nouvelle aile de résidence dans la station spatiale de Novus Prime pour les pilotes Obsidiens de haut rang. Chaque appartement contient un Système de Simulation d'Apesanteur. [#Legal]
Die Erd-Flotte hat einen neuen Wohnbereich für hochrangige Obsidian-Piloten in der Novus Prime Raumstation gebaut. Jede Wohnung enthält einen Schwerelosigkeitssimulator. [#Legal]

La flotta terrestre ha costruito una nuova ala residenziale nella stazione spaziale Novus Prime per i piloti di alto rango di Ossidiana. Ogni appartamento dispone di un sistema di simulazione a gravità zero. [#Legal]

La flota terrestre ha construido una nueva ala de residencia de la estación espacial de Novus Prime para los pilotos de alto rango de Obsidia. Cada apartamento incluye un sistema de simulación de gravedad cero. [#Legal]

Earth Fleet has constructed a new residency wing of the Novus Prime space station for high-ranking Obsidian pilots. Each apartment includes a Zero-Gravity Simulation System for the owner and guests. [#Legal]

Earth Fleet has constructed a new residency wing of the Novus Prime space station for high-ranking Obsidian pilots. Each apartment includes a Zero-Gravity Simulation System for the owner and guests. [#Legal]
